issues.description: Some secondary text has contrast slightly below 4.5:1 against the background.
issues.suggested_fix: Increase the contrast of muted text or darken the background to meet 4.5:1.

issues.description: No visible 'Skip to main content' link for keyboard users.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a skip link before the header that jumps focus to the main content.

issues.description: Some headings are visually styled but not marked up as <h*> elements.
issues.suggested_fix: Use semantic heading elements to represent the visual structure.

issues.description: Product cards are not clearly announced as grouped items.
issues.suggested_fix: Use <article> or role="group" with appropriate labels for each card.

quick_fixes: Introduce a visible 'Skip to main content' link.
Raise contrast of subtle body text on dark backgrounds.
Group product cards with accessible names for each card.
disclaimer: This EVA Accessibility hero uses static demo findings and must not be treated as a real audit.
